name: Fix code + use browser fonts
description: The default skin on the Beyonwiz forums results in text being rendered with fonts that are hard to read. This style fixes this problem by using the fonts defined in browser preferences. It also fixes an issue with [code] blocks not being formatted correctly.
additional_info:
3 May 2017
* Set width to 98% to prevent a horizontal scroll bar from appearing in some circumstances.

2 May 2017
* Fixed an issue where [code] formatted blocks were still limited to 200px height. Now [code] blocks will have their max-height limit removed so that all code is shown properly.
* Updated license from CC BY-NC-SA (Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike) to CC BY-SA (Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike)
